subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, who have not swept the Phillies since 2010, surrendered a seventh-inning lead as the bullpen and defense wasted a strong effort by the starter Mike Pelfrey.
snippet: The Mets, who have not swept the Phillies since 2010, surrendered a seventh-inning lead as the bullpen and defense wasted a strong effort by the starter Mike Pelfrey.
